betterquesting.name: The Computer
betterquesting.desc:
It is all little bit blurry, but your ship is here, mabe you can explore it and find out something about your situation. Also, BEWARE THE BEACH... those blue creatures in the water does not look friendly.

First, It looks like the ships computer is down. Pull out the components and check them out. If you will be able to start up the computer, some of the logs may give you some hints what te hell is going on.

Second, Put thecomputer parts back and start the computer. On switch is in the computer gui. There should be the log in somewhere. Run command getLogs to get the reward badge. If you succeede, the medal should appear in the output chest next to the computer.

betterquesting.name: The Pod
betterquesting.desc: First things first. Did you noticed the crashed spaceship? It is yours. Go and explore it.

betterquesting.name: Kitchen tools
betterquesting.desc:
It looks like all the kitchen tools are broken or lost. Well it is high time to replace them with new ones.

Some of the tools can be made using wood, glass and clay.

The other tools you have to find. Well, they are the metal tools so they have to be here somewhere, right? So maybe later on when you will go through the quests... I mean ships inventory.

betterquesting.name: First seeds
betterquesting.desc: There is some seed bag hiding in the pod, I know it.

betterquesting.name: Ship components
betterquesting.desc:
So, next step is to get the special stuff you need to make the ship. When you will have those, You will be able to board it and sail it. isnt it exciting?

First make the Steering wheel, the rudder. That is the core of your ship. Make this, place it anywhere on your ship, right click it and you will be on board. Beware, the direction this block is facing is the front of the ship.

To make your ship float better, make some floaters and attach them to its sides. They are light and water proof, dont worry.

betterquesting.name: Getting flax
betterquesting.desc: To get somewhere you will probably need strings, ropes and cloth.

betterquesting.name: What can I grow
betterquesting.desc: Lets grow some simple food. Those things can be easily obtaint, plant them and wait. Or you can use bone meal.

betterquesting.name: Bed for seamen
betterquesting.desc:
Did you ever wanted a bed which will travel with you? Build yourself a bed for seamen.

First, plant the flax, cotton and flex seeds and craft string, rope, cloth and fabric.

Then you can craft also wool, it is costly but possible.

And finally the bed.

betterquesting.name: Wood
betterquesting.desc:
Forget armorplastics. Getting wood as a solid building material should be your priority.

You have some basic saplings and access to dirt. It is time to plant and grow some wood. Yes, punching wood is here.

betterquesting.name: Basic resources
betterquesting.desc: By the look of it, your landing module is quite ok. Is it possible to turn on the digging head? Try the startDigger command on the computer commandline.

betterquesting.name: Wooden tools
betterquesting.desc:
Punching wood can be fun, for some time. But tiling the land, or digging? No sir. It is time to make some tools.

Build the workspace you will need.

The next step is tu curve the patterns for tools.

And to test that everything is working, build lets say mattlock.

betterquesting.name: Furnace
betterquesting.desc:
Smelt some stuff is quite essential. But, how to make furnace without cobble?
		  
Well, dry some clay and get bricks.

Six brick blocks should be enough to make a furnace.

betterquesting.name: Flint
betterquesting.desc:
Using Wooden tools is nice, but they are limited and with very little durbility. And you cannot dig grass. Next material available could be flint.

You must have a shovet to get flint.

Did you noticed you cannot craft flint? What a weird world.

You will have to dig it from gravel the old way.

betterquesting.name: Sapling, again?
betterquesting.desc: Dont say it... you lost it. Ok, I believe you saw another one in the ship.

betterquesting.name: Missing seeds
betterquesting.desc: Some seeds are missing? You can request hem here from the automatic system.

betterquesting.name: Flint tools
betterquesting.desc:
Now when you have flint it is time to put it in good use.
		  
Build parts for your flint sword and your flint pickaxe.

betterquesting.name: Gettin places
betterquesting.desc: No more cobble columns. Stylish guys and girls are using grappling hooks.

betterquesting.name: Bonemeal
betterquesting.desc:
Luckily for you, you are not a caveman and you know how to make a good fertilizer. Just to have a furnace to smelt the sapling to ash... hmm. You know what? This time, I will smelt it for you.

Nex time...Burn the sampling to get ash. Get the dirt and sand from the ships digger. Combine them and voala.

betterquesting.name: Breads
betterquesting.desc: You cannot survive only on vegetables. Lets make some bread. One or ten.

betterquesting.name: Meat
betterquesting.desc: Enough of growing food. Lets catch something. And I dont mean Aquacreepers, but something edible. Craft the fish traps and ground traps to fill your stocks of meat.

betterquesting.name: Water
betterquesting.desc:
Not all ingredients grow. Water for example can be obtained from the ocean. Well, bucket is the traditional way, right?

But option for poor is also a bowl. And for cooking, you can make fresh water.

betterquesting.name: Ship material
betterquesting.desc: The most basic components for building a ship. Yes, you could build a simple praam. But no, you need a ship so they will take you seriously. Well, to hae that you will need some materials.

betterquesting.name: Departure
betterquesting.desc: So you are set up. You have a boat and supplies to survive. Time to sail to the mainland. You pulled the coordinates from the computer. Maybe, befor you sail off, it would be safe to take the harddrive of your ships computer with you in case you will be able to use it later on.

betterquesting.name: Bonemeal 2
betterquesting.desc: Reset the Bonemeal quest

betterquesting.name: Reset Missing Seeds
betterquesting.desc: To reset this quest click the checkbox

betterquesting.name: Reset Sapling Again
betterquesting.desc: To reset the quest click the checkboxx

betterquesting.name: Magic plants, for real
betterquesting.desc: Ok, this is new. Plants growing ores. And you thought you saw everything in your life. You asked Lanecia what else can you do with the plant and she told you about some cool gadgets you can try. Required materials she buys from the miner from the Caldera camp.

betterquesting.name: Advanced Assembler
betterquesting.desc: So here we are. You need an automatic programmable assembler. Lucky for you you are with technology high enouh that you will probably be able to build one. Unlucky for you, some crucial components need Imperomite which you didn't see nowhere in the City, Village or any of the Camps. You asked about this some people and they recomended you to ask people in the Sky Station. They are closed group sitting on some old advancet techs. Maybe they would have some Imperomite for you. Start by asking Smokey the Barter, if he will trust you enough he might sed you to his friend Baaron of the Sky Station. From there you will be on your own to get inside and trade some Imperomite from the locas.

betterquesting.name: Place to live
betterquesting.desc: You reached the coast of a large island. Small costal village is near by. Talk to the harbor keeper Oran and follow his direction to your new shelter.

betterquesting.name: Wax
betterquesting.desc: Did you noticed that there are no torches available? Beeswax is probably, what you should start with. It will be also usefull when you will try to tech up. Lanecia, the healer is also local beekeeper. She can probably help you with this.

betterquesting.name: Lava
betterquesting.desc: You need to start getting and processing materials. But, when we cannot dig, how we will get lava to fuel our smeltery? Oran was talking about some mining cemp called Caldera, where they get lava when they need it. You should talk to Tyjon, the conveyer, he is doing business with Caldera camp.

betterquesting.name: Building materials
betterquesting.desc: When locals need building materials such as clay, brick or stone, they go to Algernon, the miner. It is time you meet him as well.

betterquesting.name: Processing metals
betterquesting.desc: For makin the smeltery, the process seems to be quite standard. Since you have access to Charcoal now, you can make Grout and seared bricks.

betterquesting.name: Casting
betterquesting.desc: Next step is precision casting. You need to be able to cast some basic components. So, let's build a casting table. Duranite, is required for his. You will also need some aluminium brass for the casts.

betterquesting.name: First machines
betterquesting.desc: So some materials are now available for you. What about to put them into good use and build some basic machines. Now piston requires redstone, which you may not have yet, but Miners in the village are selling some pistons, so you can buy them.

betterquesting.name: Automated energy
betterquesting.desc: Even though punching engine is a good fun, some automated energy generation would be progress. If you will make a wind mill primitive enough, you should be able to make it even without steel.

betterquesting.name: Steel
betterquesting.desc: I think you lived without steel long enough. Your friends in the village are trading with the city. Steel City they call it. They also say that it is quite easy to get the steel there. Algernon and Ezola, they both claims that they do know, how to get Pass into the city. Get it from one of them and get your first steel.

betterquesting.name: Rare Metals
betterquesting.desc: Basic metals you can obtain from Algernon, but what if you will need something more exotic? Say Redstone, or even duranite, the most important metal when it comes to casting. Solution is the conveyers wife Ezola, she is doing business with rare materials. Talk to her.

betterquesting.name: Fertilizer
betterquesting.desc: Bomer is that without the ship, materials like dirt, gravel, clay are not free any more. So, you have to think to make new renewable source of fertilizer. Did you thought about composting?

betterquesting.name: Rare commodities
betterquesting.desc: Hopefully not yet, but soon it can happen that you will need some rare items. Pearls, Gems, Gold. Looks like those are quite rare here on land, but they say that there is one camp called Lagoon, where they pick those up from the bottom of the sea. The conveyer Tyjon has contacts with them, ask him.

betterquesting.name: Treated wood
betterquesting.desc: Build a coke oven is the next logical step. Not only that produced coalcoke is the only fuel powerfull enough to fuel the blast furnace, but Creosole oil, or if you wish treated wood, is a very important material through out the tech chain. Use the engineers manual to see how to form the oven.

betterquesting.name: Charcoal
betterquesting.desc: This village seems very rudamentary in the scope of technology. You checked your options and it looks that you will have to work your way up on the ech tree mainly yourself. They say that you can get basic metals like iron and copper from Algernon, but that is it. So what you cannot get in this village is steel and that is, what you should start working on. First step is a powersource strong enough to fuel a blast furnace. That means coal coke and that needs Charcoal. Looks like local plantlife is not strong enough to produce charcoal, hmm. There was an old way how to get it, it was called Charcoal Pit. You just put on ground pile of wood 2x2, surround it with Loam so it is 4x4 and cover it with another Loam 2x2 so it forms a small piramid. Now if you set this piramid on fire it should do the trick.

betterquesting.name: Light
betterquesting.desc: 0Did you noticed one little interresting thing? NO TORCHES!!. This is a crazy planet without torches. You asked and the reason is that there is very little coal for that and the quality is very poor. So they use mainly candles.

betterquesting.name: Magic?
betterquesting.desc: When you had an evening tea with Lanecia the healer, she mentioned some flowers, which grew grains very simmilar to redstone. It would be usefull to ask her more about it nad get some for your own need. Don't you think?

betterquesting.name: Workshop
betterquesting.desc: It was fun playing with sword and bow, but you will probably never become a good archer. You are used to things that do bang or bzzz and every enemy in it's view just vaporizes imidiately. So, let's build some guns, right? Do you have access to steel? You will need it for this.

betterquesting.name: Observatory
betterquesting.desc: So ok, the temple is the rocket silo. So your next step is to get access to it, right? The Steel City highpriest Lavan can definitley give you that with a proper motivation. Without his blessing it will hardly be possible. So, be patient, do what he asks for... and politely ge your ass inside. Hopefully there is a working rocket of some kind there.

betterquesting.name: Moar ores
betterquesting.desc: Anything more advanced than simple electron tubes electronics requires some fine processing environmet. And that means some robotic assembling or eezo pool. Fill carpenter with eezo reactant and you can assemble circutry or even primitive controllers. But where to get ezzo? They say that Steel City Powerguard, Luther has some contacts with the Abyss Mining Camp. This camp is the local source of such materials. So ask Luther.

betterquesting.name: Deep dive
betterquesting.desc: Did you know that with your current level of technology, you can build a working submarine? Of course ocean is still full of those nasty aquacreepers, but with a submarine, you could maybe dive down and get that missing navigational chip from your ship. You need a dock for building a submarine. Ask Rashan, the Steel City Technician for that.

betterquesting.name: Better power
betterquesting.desc: You cannot power you way to space just wind mills, right? So, what are the other options? Now that you have steel, you could probably build a water wheel, or even a lightning rod, right?

betterquesting.name: No more casting
betterquesting.desc: Cast every gear and every plate you need becomes demanding pritty quickley. Luckily even on this technological level, you can make press and stop wasting resources. Which brings us to another question. Did you allready tried conveyor belts?

betterquesting.name: Bee Alveary
betterquesting.desc: Bees are important source of several products, not just wax. Start with honey but you can go very, very far from there if you try. The only condition is to have suficient breeding equiptment and automated hive keeping.

betterquesting.name: Automatic farming
betterquesting.desc: Fertilizer, hoe and axe is fun, isn't it? Well if not, having access to electron tube electronics can bring you automated farms, if you are interrested. Now every farm needs water energy and fertilizer. You have to build the farm as at least 4x4x4 structure and then build a platform around it on which it will place the dirt and plant.

betterquesting.name: Getting inside
betterquesting.desc: So the inside of the Silo was a fail. No rocket here and the power seems to be shut off. Even though some advanced computer setup was here so you can use it later for accessing your own logs. But, what to do now? Well, there seems to be some underground part of the base which is not accessible from here. Maybe it could be accessible from that DeepUnder Camp some people in the Steel City are talking about. So find this DeepUnder Camp and discuss it with their campleader Darell. To find out how to get into the DeepUnder, ask Rashan or Luther. Convince Darell the campleader to help you get in the base.

betterquesting.name: Fueling up
betterquesting.desc: Soo, you found a rocket. Hooray. Now the big question comes. IT HAS NO FUEL!! How are you going to fuel a rocket here? Calm down. There was some old receipt, how to make some very rudamentary fuel... it will be expensive, but possible. You will need some machinery. Namely Refinery and Mixer.

betterquesting.name: The Suit
betterquesting.desc: Now you have some real electronics available. Maybe you can try to build that suit. Ofcourse this will require the Percission Assembler and some work, but hey, it is your safety so it is worth to do it. Also the suit workstation will be needed.

betterquesting.name: Setting up PC
betterquesting.desc: If you did not done so, it is also time to use the equiptment in the Silo and set up the computer again. Your hard drive contains important information about what is where on your ship, so you better remember it, or have it available all the time.

betterquesting.name: Here we go
betterquesting.desc: Blast Off right? Hmm, we will see. First, you have to move the rocket somewhere, where it will be under open sky. You also need to move the rocket assembler, lounch platform and monitoring station. You need to power it up and fuel up the rocket. Don't forget to insert your Space Station Chip and off you go. Oh, one little thing. Don't forget the suit and enough oxygen please. Just think, befor you blast yourself off.

betterquesting.name: Unified Electronics
betterquesting.desc: Oh of course, there is no space suit nowhere in this whole Base. What did you expected? Mission controll, we are ready to lift-off? Sorry, I have to stay constructive. The problem is that I am sure, there is NO WAY that you could build a proper space suit with your current level of technology. So you will have to advanced even further, before you will be able to reach your ship.

betterquesting.name: Advanced Machines
betterquesting.desc: If you can do unified electronics and transistor based technology, you may be thinking about improving also your processing methods. Lathe and rolling machine is a great modern alternative to press and they are even more cost effective.

betterquesting.name: Advanced Circutry
betterquesting.desc: Your suit also requires oxygen tanks. To fill them you will need an Electrolyser and for that you will need some Advanced Circuitry. Maybe your new friends from the Station know about some of that quartz you will need. Ask Dominic the workshop assistant.

betterquesting.name: Canola Power
betterquesting.desc: So now you have steel and some power. You can also start thinking about sources of power which are not that omnipotent as nature. It looks like that Canola became part of the local quisine. Canola, in larger quantities could be used as a crude fuelsource. Do you want to try it out?

betterquesting.name: Gadgets
betterquesting.desc: There are several very usefull utilities, some of them, you are surely able to build even now. If not now then soon.

betterquesting.name: Portable Power
betterquesting.desc: More and more items you want need power. What about you create some portable storage of power which you will be able to carry around. Some kind of battery?

betterquesting.name: Suit Up
betterquesting.desc: Access to some basic processing also means that you can advance in your armor. I don''t think it will be enough for those Aqua Creepers yet, but it will be much better than what you had so far.

betterquesting.name: My First Computer
betterquesting.desc: Sooner or later you will have to get into computers. You will need some automation, information management or database. So why not start now?

betterquesting.name: Crushing
betterquesting.desc: Miners are selling ores and simple smelting of ore is fine but you wagely remember that if you crush and clean the ore before smelting, you could get double the yield easily. But how to crush things on this level of technology?

betterquesting.name: Finally mining
betterquesting.desc: The little detail that rock is really hard and almost impossible to mine with picks really borthers you. But you are resourcefull guy. An with the progress you are making, you could be probably able to make a pneumatic drill. Soo? Will you try it?

betterquesting.name: Fast Electron Tubes
betterquesting.desc: Now that you have thermionic fabricator it will be really easy to make some more tubes... well first you need silicon.

betterquesting.name: Outside the pod
betterquesting.desc: Your pod crashed on a small island. Race for survival begins. Do you know what is waiting for you outside?

betterquesting.name: Into the Space
betterquesting.desc: After landing on the shore of that inhabited island, you are facing another challange. Can those preindustrial-looking inhabitants be enough to get you back into space?
